the main functionality and purpose of this api is to provide real-time or historical exchange rate information for us dollars (usd) and canadian dollars (cad). the api offers five endpoints for different operations:

1. get /exchange-rate: retrieves a list of all available exchange rates.
2. post /exchange-rate: adds a new exchange rate to the system.
3. put /exchange-rate/{id}: updates an existing exchange rate for a specific date.
4. delete /exchange-rate/{id}: deletes an existing exchange rate by its unique identifier.
5. get /exchange-rate/{date}/from/{from}/to/{to}: gets the exchange rate between the given source and destination currencies (from/to) for a specific date.
